name: Brix (itch) (kenndox)
description:
Another highschool project!

In highschool we had to make a breakout clone in JavaScript and this was the game I produced. It's sometimes pretty broken, but works for the most part. It uses local storage to save high scores.

This game has audio and shows a popup when you lose, so beware!

Song:  an0va - There Was a Planet Here
